Detailed Description

Contains all detection thread information for current interaction session.

Contains information about detection thread. This structure is used to store active and lost detection threads

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  oix,
int  oiy,
int  odx,
int  ody,
IplImage *  hIN,
IplImage *  hgrayIN = NULL 
) [inline]

Provides external detection data for a face.

For situations in which eye detection has been done by an external tool

Parameters:
iface Face to correct
oix x coordinate of left eye
oiy y coordinate of left eye
odx x coordinate of right eye
ody y coordinate of right eye
hIN Input image used to detect in color
hgrayIN Input image used to detect in gray

Parameters:
i Face or frtrction thread to update

oiy y coordinate of left eye
odx x coordinate of right eye
ody y coordinate of right eye
TrackWidth Heuristic value for trackers
hIN Input color image
hgrayIN Input gray image
